timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 * Retrieve <tt>SyndFeed</tt> of the given URL

timeline.author: bwiedmann

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/main/java/sirius/biz/web/RssFeedHelper.java b/src/main/java/sirius/biz/web/RssFeedHelper.java
index 2320f132..447d7b8b 100644
--- a/src/main/java/sirius/biz/web/RssFeedHelper.java
+++ b/src/main/java/sirius/biz/web/RssFeedHelper.java

@@ -49,7 +49,7 @@ public class RssFeedHelper {
     }
 
     /**
-     * Retrieve <tt>SyndFeed</tt> of the given URL
+     * Retrieves a {@link SyndFeed} of the given URL
      *
      * @param feedUrl the URL to fetch the RSS feed from
      * @return a SyndFeed instance for the given URL
